translations: 排列；归类于（rank 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 等级法；排序法；秩评定法

sentences.sentence: She has retained her No.1 world ranking.
sentences.translation: 她保住了自己世界第一的排名。

sentences.sentence: She has dropped to third in the world ranking.
sentences.translation: 她已跌至世界排名第三。

sentences.sentence: Agassi was playing well above his world ranking of 12.
sentences.translation: 阿加西的比赛表现大大超出了他在世界上第12位的排名。
